The museum has a parking lot available for visitors. On-site parking is 50rupees for the first hour and will increment 10rupees for each hour after that, subject to availability. Parking will be free for educational visits.

Our standard adult ticket is Rs.200/person, children (ages 5-12) are Rs.150/individual, and seniors (65+) are alloted a discount of 50%. Children under 5 enter for free. These prices are the same for both online and offline bookings.

patterns: I want to book a ticket
responses: Certainly! I'd be happy to help you book a ticket online. Please provide the following information: your name, mobile number, the number of tickets, and your preferred date and time of visit. For offline booking, please refer to the in-museum ticket vending machines according to your requirement.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay by credit card?
responses: For online bookings, we accept UPI and credit/debit cards. Cash payments are not available for online transactions. For offline booking, please refer to the in-museum ticket vending machines according to your requirement.

Yes, you can cancel or modify your online booking up to 24 hours before your scheduled visit. Please log in to your account or provide your booking ID for any changes or cancellations. Refunds will be processed through the original payment gateway with a liable deduction of 10% of the total booking amount (within 2 to 4 working days).
Yes, the museum is fully wheelchair accessible. When booking online, you can indicate any specific accessibility requirements with a nominal fee of 50rupees.

The museum has a parking lot available for visitors. On-site parking is 50rupees for the first hour and will increment 10rupees for each hour after that, subject to availability. Parking will be free for educational visits.

Your ticket ID is a unique number generated when you complete your online booking. You can find it in your message box or SMS box on your device. Please keep this ID handy for quick check-in at the museum. In case your ID is not found, give your registered mobile number and your SMS will be resent to you.

patterns: Can I buy tickets at the museum?
responses: While we encourage online booking for a smoother experience, offline booking is available. For offline booking, please refer to the in-museum ticket vending machines according to your requirement. These machines are located across the museum and accept both UPI and card payments.
